It is the purpose of God to glorify Himself through His representatives. In this present world and throughout the eternal ages God will reveal what He will do through His believing children. He will display His glory as He acknowledges them before the whole universe of heaven and all created intelligences. The Lord will give us all the exaltation that we deserve.--Ms 224, 1902. 

Ellen G. White Estate Washington, D. C. Dec. 17, 1987. Entire Ms.
